import { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { StoreContext } from '../store/index'; import { SET_ITEM_BUNS, SET_ITEM_MEAT } from '../utils/constants'; import meat from '../json/meat.json'; import burgerBuns from '../json/burgerBuns.json'; import ingredients from '../json/ingredient.json'; export default function CartList() { const {state} = useContext(StoreContext); return(
Description
Quantity

・

NT{state.itemPrice[0]}
TOTAL: NT {state.itemPrice[0]}
); }
